sentences.en: Astronomers may one day travel to the depths of space.
sentences.cn: 天文学家也许有一天可以到太空深处去。

sentences.en: Both housings are waterproof to a depth of two metres.
sentences.cn: 两个机罩的防水深度均为两米。

sentences.en: Everything he writes demonstrates the depth of his sensibility.
sentences.cn: 他笔下的一切都显示出他深深的感悟。

sentences.en: His music lacks depth.
sentences.cn: 他的音乐缺乏深度。

sentences.en: It's beyond my depth when it comes to natural sciences.
sentences.cn: 谈到自然科学我就茫然.

sentences.en: Lindbergh was startled at the ferocious depth of anti-British feeling.
sentences.cn: 反英情绪之深之烈令林德伯格大为震惊。

sentences.en: Mr Gibson is clearly intellectually out of his depth.
sentences.cn: 吉布森先生显然才智不逮。

sentences.en: People need to realize the depth of the problem.
sentences.cn: 人们必须认识到这个问题的严重程度。

sentences.en: research students pursue a specific aspect of a subject in depth.
sentences.cn: 研究生对课题的某一特定方面进行深入研究。

sentences.en: solo spots reveal hidden depths.
sentences.cn: 插演（或插播）的独奏（或独唱）小节目往往会显露出不为人知的内秀。

sentences.en: The blue base gives the red paint more depth.
sentences.cn: 蓝色底色将红色涂料衬托得愈加浓重。

sentences.en: The country'sleadership had underestimated the depth of the crisis.
sentences.cn: 该国领导人低估了这场危机的严重性。

sentences.en: The depth of covert racism in my own profession frightens me.
sentences.cn: 我所从事的职业中暗藏着如此深的种族主义偏见，这让我感到害怕。

sentences.en: the depth of her love
sentences.cn: 她那爱之深

sentences.en: The fat, broad tyres had a good depth of tread.
sentences.cn: 这种宽大的轮胎有很深的胎面花纹。

sentences.en: The smaller lake ranges from five to fourteen feet in depth.
sentences.cn: 小一些的湖深度从5英尺到14英尺不等。

sentences.en: Together these factors determine the depth of focus.
sentences.cn: 这些因素综合起来决定了景深。

sentences.en: We will discuss these three areas in depth.
sentences.cn: 我们将深入探讨这3个领域。

sentences.en: What's the depth of the water here?
sentences.cn: 这儿的水有多深？

sentences.en: White wines tend to gain depth of colour with age.
sentences.cn: 白葡萄酒年头愈久，颜色愈深。

words.tran_cn: 使深化；加深（deepen的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 色深；颜色深度；色彩深度
切削深度，切削厚度；掏槽深度；切项度；开挖深度
对顾客需要的深入查询
沿深度掺杂分布图；深度剖面
详细地，全面地，深入地。 参见 in-depth

trans.tran_cn: 深（度），（感情）深厚，严重性，深奥，深渊，（知识）渊博，(照片、画作等的)景深，…最严重的时候
trans.tran_en: the part that is furthest away from people, and most difficult to reach
